option.name: name
option.value: app: oly.netpowerctrl

option.name: TOOL_WINDOW_CONFIGURED_FILTER
option.value: app: oly.netpowerctrl

list.name: Default
list.comment: Theme, Refactor, Loading * Improve design for light theme, dark theme broken. * Requery for devices * Show loading animation in outlets screen on start * Use setEmptyView on all gridviews * Remove DragDrop ListView * Add DynamicGrid for Drag&Drop on Phones and Tablets. * Edit scenes by going into edit mode and clicking on item. * Move PluginController into Application instead of Activity * Remove PluginViews. This will be integrated into the outlets screen. * Refactor main activity -> DrawerController class introduced. * Refactor main application -> RuntimeDataController class introduced.

option.name: description
option.value: Displays the Android dependencies of the project

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles all variants of all applications and secondary packages.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles all Debug builds

option.value: Assembles the Test build for the Debug build

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles all Release builds

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles and tests this project.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles and tests this project and all projects that depend on it.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles and tests this project and all projects it depends on.

option.name: description
option.value: Runs all checks.

option.name: description
option.value: Deletes the build directory.

option.name: description
option.value: Runs all device checks on currently connected devices.

option.name: description
option.value: Installs and runs the tests for Build 'debug' on connected devices.

option.name: description
option.value: Runs all device checks using Device Providers and Test Servers.

option.name: description
option.value: Installs the Debug build

option.name: description
option.value: Installs the Test build for the Debug build

option.name: myItemId
option.value: External Libraries

option.name: VM_PARAMETERS
option.value: -Xmx512m -Xms256m -XX:MaxPermSize=250m -ea

task.summary: Default task

Implement missing functionality, refactor package structure * New package "datastructure" and "network" * Add icons for refresh,show hidden, hide hidden * Outlets can be renamed, can be hidden, can be reordered * Scenes can be created again (fix) * New concept for widgets * Fix lint warnings
Still missing: * Save scenes and configured devices as json files * Renamed outlets are not persistent (json files necessary) * NFC (json files necessary) * Widgets do not work * Device test before saving as configured device

Remove About, Add Feedback, Add Version Number to Drawer * Device test before saving as configured device * Reordering of outlets * German help text improved
Still missing: * Save scenes and configured devices as json files * Renamed outlets are not persistent (json files necessary) * NFC (json files necessary) * Widgets do not work

Widgets, fix bulk send
Still missing / bugs: * Save scenes and configured devices as json files * NFC * Testing * Widget Updates, Update time configurable * Scenes no grid only list

Add missing files
Still missing / bugs: * Save scenes and configured devices as json files * NFC * Testing * Widget Updates, Update time configurable * Scenes no grid only list

Scene details shorter, widgets work, listen service fix * Listen Service fixed * Widgets use a Widget Update Service * ShortcutExecutionActivity updates widgets if necessary * DevicesUpdate Interface for adapters (un/registerDeviceUpdate) * New mechanism for requesting a device update and get informed on that update or get a timeout * New data structure: DeviceCommand. Build from OutletCommandGroup which is good for storing on disk but not for creating the command udp packet.
Still missing / bugs: * Save scenes and configured devices as json files * NFC * Testing

NFC working, new datastructures, json * DeviceInfo, OutletInfo and new DeviceCollection are de/serializable via json * NFC selection dialog for transferred configured devices * Editing scenes work
Missing: * Bug in saving scenes, where the wrong one is overwritten * Plugins
NFC fixes
Remove apk, add .idea to gitignore
Don't show disabled outlets anymore

Version 1.5 * Fix: Abstrze im "Alle Steckdosen"-Fenster behoben, das Speichern von versteckten Steckdosen * Fix: Das Erstellen von Szenen ist wieder mglich. * Feature: Widgets werden jetzt ber einen Hintergrundservice aktuell gehalten. Dies kann in den Einstellungen abgeschaltet werden. * Deutsche bersetzung vervollstndigt. * Feature: NFC / Android Beam kann nun auch Szenen bertragen. * Feature: Im "Alle Steckdosen"-Fenster knnen die Gertenamen nun vor den Steckdosennamen angezeigt werden. * Feature: Steckdosen knnen alphabetisch sortiert werden im "Alle Steckdosen"-Fenster.
Update doc images to reflect version 1.5
Fix crashes in all outlets window while switching and if more than one widget
Fix crashes in all outlets window, fix NFC, add not reachable hint

Crash fix, Optimization, Smoothness * Drag & Drop of Scenes and Outlets in ListViews (not Gridviews atm) * Polished UI, more feedback, wifi state changes, Reachability * Fix: 8th Outlet can be toggled in scenes now * Plugins: Find by Broadcast
Notify on shortcut click, if option is set
Notify on shortcut click, if option is set

Version 1.9a * Fix many widget problems and a crash * Move all send code to DeviceSend * Sending is in one worker thread with a queue now * Delay work in onCreate-Activity for a smoother gui * Plugins working
Problems: * PluginController does not update DrawerAdapter on a second Activity start (when PluginController object already exists)
Version 1.9b * Fix crash if listen service unbind is called while the service is not bound * Recreate plugin menu

Version 1.9c * Fix crashes caused by PluginController * Only load PluginController if enabled * PluginController works reliable now * Support unloaded/vanished plugins * Do not restore Activity with Feedback Dialog * Fix problem with InetAddress.getByName in gui thread * Send broadcast packets to all network interfaces * Show better error messages if network is not reachable * Query existing devices only, if network does not support broadcasts (2G, 3G)
Widget preferences
Widget update improved, create scene from all current outlet states
Fix NullPointerException if getHostByName failed

Improve reaction to network connected/disconnected states. Resend handler. * Widgets work now as expected when network state changes. * AfterSendHandler removed, SendJobRepeater introduced. Works for single outlets, scenes and widgets.
Fix widgets icon selection (for newer android versions) Fix crash on start (adapter not ready in main activity) Hide non reachable outlets

Theme, Refactor, Loading * Improve design for light theme, dark theme broken. * Requery for devices * Show loading animation in outlets screen on start * Use setEmptyView on all gridviews * Remove DragDrop ListView * Add DynamicGrid for Drag&Drop on Phones and Tablets. * Edit scenes by going into edit mode and clicking on item. * Move PluginController into Application instead of Activity * Remove PluginViews. This will be integrated into the outlets screen. * Refactor main activity -> DrawerController class introduced. * Refactor main application -> RuntimeDataController class introduced.

MESSAGE.value:
Fix lint warnings, Fix crash Still missing: * Save scenes and configured devices as json files * Renamed outlets are not persistent (json files necessary) * NFC (json files necessary) * Widgets do not work * Device test before saving as configured device

Remove About, Add Feedback, Add Version Number to Drawer * Device test before saving as configured device * Reordering of outlets * German help text improved
Still missing: * Save scenes and configured devices as json files * Renamed outlets are not persistent (json files necessary) * NFC (json files necessary) * Widgets do not work

Widgets, fix bulk send
Still missing / bugs: * Save scenes and configured devices as json files * NFC * Testing * Widget Updates, Update time configurable * Scenes no grid only list

Add missing files
Still missing / bugs: * Save scenes and configured devices as json files * NFC * Testing * Widget Updates, Update time configurable * Scenes no grid only list

Scene details shorter, widgets work, listen service fix * Listen Service fixed * Widgets use a Widget Update Service * ShortcutExecutionActivity updates widgets if necessary * DevicesUpdate Interface for adapters (un/registerDeviceUpdate) * New mechanism for requesting a device update and get informed on that update or get a timeout * New data structure: DeviceCommand. Build from OutletCommandGroup which is good for storing on disk but not for creating the command udp packet.
Still missing / bugs: * Save scenes and configured devices as json files * NFC * Testing

NFC working, new datastructures, json * DeviceInfo, OutletInfo and new DeviceCollection are de/serializable via json * NFC selection dialog for transferred configured devices * Editing scenes work
Missing: * Bug in saving scenes, where the wrong one is overwritten * Plugins
NFC fixes
Remove apk, add .idea to gitignore
Don't show disabled outlets anymore

Version 1.5 * Fix: Abstrze im "Alle Steckdosen"-Fenster behoben, das Speichern von versteckten Steckdosen * Fix: Das Erstellen von Szenen ist wieder mglich. * Feature: Widgets werden jetzt ber einen Hintergrundservice aktuell gehalten. Dies kann in den Einstellungen abgeschaltet werden. * Deutsche bersetzung vervollstndigt. * Feature: NFC / Android Beam kann nun auch Szenen bertragen. * Feature: Im "Alle Steckdosen"-Fenster knnen die Gertenamen nun vor den Steckdosennamen angezeigt werden. * Feature: Steckdosen knnen alphabetisch sortiert werden im "Alle Steckdosen"-Fenster.
Update doc images to reflect version 1.5
Fix crashes in all outlets window while switching and if more than one widget
Fix crashes in all outlets window, fix NFC, add not reachable hint

Crash fix, Optimization, Smoothness * Drag & Drop of Scenes and Outlets in ListViews (not Gridviews atm) * Polished UI, more feedback, wifi state changes, Reachability * Fix: 8th Outlet can be toggled in scenes now * Plugins: Find by Broadcast
Notify on shortcut click, if option is set
Notify on shortcut click, if option is set

Version 1.9a * Fix many widget problems and a crash * Move all send code to DeviceSend * Sending is in one worker thread with a queue now * Delay work in onCreate-Activity for a smoother gui * Plugins working
Problems: * PluginController does not update DrawerAdapter on a second Activity start (when PluginController object already exists)
Version 1.9b * Fix crash if listen service unbind is called while the service is not bound * Recreate plugin menu

Version 1.9c * Fix crashes caused by PluginController * Only load PluginController if enabled * PluginController works reliable now * Support unloaded/vanished plugins * Do not restore Activity with Feedback Dialog * Fix problem with InetAddress.getByName in gui thread * Send broadcast packets to all network interfaces * Show better error messages if network is not reachable * Query existing devices only, if network does not support broadcasts (2G, 3G)
Widget preferences
Widget update improved, create scene from all current outlet states
Fix NullPointerException if getHostByName failed

Improve reaction to network connected/disconnected states. Resend handler. * Widgets work now as expected when network state changes. * AfterSendHandler removed, SendJobRepeater introduced. Works for single outlets, scenes and widgets.
Fix widgets icon selection (for newer android versions) Fix crash on start (adapter not ready in main activity) Hide non reachable outlets

Theme, Refactor, Loading * Improve design for light theme, dark theme broken. * Requery for devices * Show loading animation in outlets screen on start * Use setEmptyView on all gridviews * Remove DragDrop ListView * Add DynamicGrid for Drag&Drop on Phones and Tablets. * Edit scenes by going into edit mode and clicking on item. * Move PluginController into Application instead of Activity * Remove PluginViews. This will be integrated into the outlets screen. * Refactor main activity -> DrawerController class introduced. * Refactor main application -> RuntimeDataController class introduced.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Theme, Refactor, Loading * Improve design for light theme, dark theme broken. * Requery for devices * Show loading animation in outlets screen on start * Use setEmptyView on all gridviews * Remove DragDrop ListView * Add DynamicGrid for Drag&Drop on Phones and Tablets. * Edit scenes by going into edit mode and clicking on item. * Move PluginController into Application instead of Activity * Remove PluginViews. This will be integrated into the outlets screen. * Refactor main activity -> DrawerController class introduced. * Refactor main application -> RuntimeDataController class introduced.
